content:
I am trying to build the following dockerfile for the https://github.com/open-compass/opencompass.git repository. It should install any necessary dependencies and then run tests to confirm that installation succeeded:
# Use an official Python runtime as a parent image
FROM python:3.10-slim

# Set the working directory in the container
WORKDIR /app

# Copy the entire repository into the container
COPY . /app/

# Install conda and necessary tools
RUN apt-get update && \ 
    apt-get install -y wget && \ 
    wget -qO- https://repo.anaconda.com/miniconda/Miniconda3-latest-Linux-x86_64.sh | bash && \ 
    rm Miniconda3-latest-Linux-x86_64.sh && \ 
    /bin/bash -c "source /root/miniconda3/bin/activate base" && \ 
    echo "export PATH=/root/miniconda3/bin:$PATH" >> ~/.bashrc

# Create a conda environment and install dependencies
RUN /bin/bash -c "source /root/miniconda3/bin/activate && \
    conda create --name opencompass python=3.10 -y && \
    conda run -n opencompass pip install -e ."

# Run the test suite
RUN /bin/bash -c "source /root/miniconda3/bin/activate opencompass && \
    pytest"

vm_control.OutOfStorage: 
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/home/coinse/Documents/lm/spring2024/doctest/vm_control.py", line 294, in test_dockerfile

  File "/home/coinse/Documents/lm/spring2024/doctest/vm_control.py", line 160, in build_project
    raise OutOfStorage()

  File "/home/coinse/Documents/lm/spring2024/doctest/vm_control.py", line 335, in test_dockerfile

  File "/home/coinse/Documents/lm/spring2024/doctest/vm_control.py", line 301, in test_dockerfile
